recipesJson.name: Strawberry Watermelon Bubblegum
recipesJson.author: SamKayla
recipesJson.description: Watermelon and strawberry bubblegum !! Marshmallow is just here for the mouth feel! And everything works great here together , Ethyl maltol to round it off and give it that candy bubblegum flavor that I was looking for here ! My take of Watermelon & strawberry Bubblegum !! Mix it up people !!!!.. shake and vape best after about three days ..

reviews.text: The zebra stripe gum takes over on this, misses the mark for Hubba bubba but decent attempt- maybe use cap bubble gum instead of fruit stripe?
